name: Midnight Monastery
description:
A small game about a dark monastery and a little monk with an oil lamp. Find the way through the tree levels and don't let your oil run out.

Please use the Windows version for best performance. 

I'm not a programmer but a pastor, so it's not a very professional game. It was developed in Gamemaker Studio 2. I used sprites and sounds from an old project called PixelLuther.
